dialogueNodes.text: The Klagenfurt Quantum Game Academy, an innovative, futuristic institution dedicated to game studies and engineering.
Here young minds are not just prepared for the digital future, but are actively involved in shaping it, pushing the boundaries of the physical and digital realms.
Because in that world the virtual realities are more than simply videogames on a computer.
In this academy, an exceptional intellect and brilliant student named Haru pursued his passion for gaming, oblivious to the grand journey destiny had laid out for him.
One fateful day, during the exploration of an unknown digital world, Haru received a vision.
Accompanied by an image of a green creature, imprisoned in a magical cage.
The creature was Gamebert, imprisoned by a vicious mage called Johan Huizinga.
Along with his disciples, Felixus, Matthiatos, Reneah, and Marcaton, Huizinga was a tyrant who was holding Gamebert.
"I need to save Gamebert”, Haru thought to himself."
However, upon release, Gamebert began merging the digital and physical realities, causing widespread chaos. Gamebert defended his actions, claiming it was the only way to reach the promised land
Gamebert was no innocent victim. They were the cause of what happened, where Huizinga, the supposed Tyrant, was actually a guardian trying to maintain the balance between the real and digital worlds.
Embroiled in guilt and a newfound sense of responsibility, Haru sought out Huzinga's disciples.
Contrary to Gamebert's assertions, the 4 disciples were not the worshipers of destruction but the guardians of a powerful artifact, the Magic Circle
This device held the power to control digital data, maintaining the segregation between the physical and digital worlds.
Haru has been training under the guidance of the four disciples of Huizinga, who showed him how to become a true guardian of Eden.
Finally ready to face Gambert in what could be the clash that would decree the end of all reality or the salvation of all.
"I started this story, and only I can finish it... Now it is my turn, Gambert I will defeat you!"
